You will be charged for your iTunes account. It is automatically renewed every month from the application date.

The membership period will be automatically renewed unless you cancel automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the end date of the premium service membership period.
Charges for automatic renewal will be made within 24 hours after the end of the membership period.

【Confirmation / Withdrawal of membership status (cancellation of automatic renewal))
Confirmation of member status and withdrawal can be done from the following.
1. Open the App Store application
2. Scroll to the bottom of the "Recommended" tab
3. Tap "Apple ID"
4. Tap "Show Apple ID" in the displayed pop-up
5. Sign in as needed
6. Tap "Register" on the "Account" screen
Please confirm the next automatic update date and time and cancel / setting automatic update on this screen.

【Cancellation for the current month】
We do not accept cancellation of the premium service for the current month.
